effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
